sentence.Network_en: Aurora felt the opium haze enfold her.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥萝拉感觉自己被笼罩在鸦片烟霾中。

sentence.Network_en: As I slid into bed, Lucile reached out to enfold me in her arms.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我躺上床的时候, 露西尔探身过来用双臂抱住我.

sentence.Network_en: And when his wings enfold you yield to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他的翅膀拥抱着你,请你屈从他!

list.abs: He enfolded the child an affectionate embrace ., 她爱怜地把小孩抱在怀里.
He enfolded her when they met ., 见面时 , 他拥抱了她.
海妖之歌_Jimmy_新浪博客 ... Sail to me 漂向我 Let me enfold you 让我拥抱你 Here I am 我在这里.
all i have are these arms to enfold you ., 而我只有这双手臂来拥抱你.
and when his wings enfold you , yield to him , though the sword hidden among his pinions may wound you .当他的翅膀拥抱你的时候，屈服于他，尽管藏在他羽翼下的剑可能会伤了你。
Anticipating your to enfold my hands To return home ., 等待你来牵我的手 . 回家.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'involve, entail, imply'; formerly also as infold): from en-, in- 'within' + fold

entry.def: If something enfolds an object or person, they cover, surround, or are wrapped around that object or person.

example.ex: Aurora felt the opium haze enfold her...
example.tran: 奥萝拉感觉自己被笼罩在鸦片烟霾中。

example.ex: Wood was now comfortably enfolded in a woolly dressing-gown.
example.tran: 伍德正舒服地穿着件羊毛晨衣。

entry.def: If you enfold someone or something, you hold them close in a very gentle, loving way.

example.ex: Thack came up behind him, enfolding him in his arms.
example.tran: 撒克走到他身后，伸开双臂拥抱他。

means.word_mean: 1. enclose or enfold completely with or as if with a covering;

auth_sentence.content: Enfold us each and Heidi Klum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Enfold us each and Heidi Klum.

auth_sentence.content: The pointy-headed busybodies have yet to enfold these youngsters in the iron-clad conformity of cultural diversity's embrace.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pointy-headed busybodies have yet to enfold these youngsters in the iron-clad conformity of cultural diversity's embrace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pointy-headed busybodies have yet to enfold these youngsters in the iron-clad conformity of cultural diversity's embrace.

sentences.en: The mother was enfolding her baby in her arms.
sentences.cn: 母亲把婴儿抱在自己怀里。
